attributes.action: Get sports involving our National teams on free to air television.
attributes.background: Far too many sporting events involving our National teams are only available on pay to view television.   They should be available on free to air television,

rejection.details:
If you would like Parliament to change the law, to make all sporting events involving national teams "listed events" that must be offered to free-to-air channels, you could start a new petition calling for that.

You can find out more about the law here:

http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/SN00802
